thi-ap4:1.2_0: the world, for the world of the gods,
thi-ap4:2.3_0: The world’s compassionate for the world,
thi-ap4:3.2_0: the world is unskilled in the world.
thi-ap4:4.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
thi-ap4:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
thi-ap4:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the nun Kaṅkassa.
thi-ap4:8.1_0: for the senior by rising of the senior monks.
